p: Another study investigated the antifungal activity of clove EO in an emulsion and in a liposomal form in mice with VVC. After 8 d of treatment, a reduction in vaginal fungal load was observed for both forms tested. However, the liposomal form was found to be more effective than the emulsion form of the EO. In addition, the free EO was only able to eliminate the infection after 14 d.
